main event: A balloon-shaped object, white in color, was observed flying in a southerly direction over Alsea, Oregon.
interesting points: The object was observed for 30 minutes without any man-made sounds,The possibility that the observation was a reflection of light off a valley fog layer was noted,Investigator's notes indicated radar contact with the object but it was not confirmed, Several reliable witnesses, including an experienced officer, reported observing the object, The object's reported speed was approximately 3000-4500 MPH at an estimated altitude of 50,000 feet.
witness description: two witnesses, one an experienced officer in investigating incidents
